General.Name: Sunway Co Ltd
General.Description: Sunway Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacturing, and sale of cable products. It offers its products for various applications, such as nuclear facilities, road transit, smart grid, solar photovoltaic power generation, firefighting, and construction. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Star Cable Co., Ltd. Sunway Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Leshan, China.
